name: Truth or Dare: For Teens
description:
King of Booze: Truth or Dare is a fun drinking game for adults! Ideal for house parties and all other gatherings you want to spice up.


Rules:
1. Pass the phone around
2. Decide if you want truth or dare
3. If you don't want to answer the question or do the dare, you have to drink.

Or you can play without drinking, that means no backing out!

That's about it.

The sentences/challenges are divided between 6 very different categories, there is over 650+ Truths or Dares you can get. If you don't want to talk about, or do the dirty, sexy, relationship stuff you simply don't use those decks. If you want a full on crazy night you simply remove the normal decks. Choose your own adventure.

Keep in mind that this is the game for ADULTS, if you're too young or easily offended this is not the game for you.

If you like the game show your love by rating it.

If you wanna join other party monsters and see what else we got find King of Booze group on FB or IG.

Hope you have a blast.

Please drink responsibly,
